title: President Rajapaksa receives World Bank top official
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma – (Pix By: Sudath Silva) Visiting World Bank Vice President for South Asia Ms. Isabel Guerrero paid a courtesy call on President Mahinda Rajapaksa recently at the President’s House in Colombo. The main focus of the key meeting between President Rajapaksa and the top of World Bank official was…
